divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside on the porch visiting my wife and got up to get some more coffee and stepped back outside and started pouring coffee in my wifes cup then she said what the hell is that then i looked up and saw a triangle shaped object with three blue lights traveling west. It was really not going fast and had a outline shape of a sting ray shape to the object. The object did not make a sound and was amazed of the object could not figure out the object. Lost the object when it went over the house. Ran off the porch and tried to see it again when it went over the house lost it because of the street lights.
Summary: saw a triangled shaped object with three blue lights withing the triangle
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wolf Point
There were no other sightings in Wolf Point on or around September 24th 2011
